attributes.action: Hold a New Inquiry into Stephen Lawrence Inquiry
attributes.additional_details:
Jacket seized from wardrobe. PACE guidelines, photo in situ, bag and seal forensics in situ and record in notebook with household countersignatory not followed.   Household dust trace  analysis second forensics never pursued. 

Fly enzymes liquefy flaked blood.  Third forensics not pursued.

Inquiries called for by Kent Police Authority 1997,  touching on an allegedly corrupt case detective not pursued. With anti terrorist CIB3 and Special Branch inquiry concealed from MacPherson Inquiry
attributes.background: Stephen Lawrence was killed in late April 1993 at a time pollen was high especially grass, oak, ash,poplar, birch,pine, plane.  Nearby was a large cemetery and a large common as sources of pollen. The first forensics never pursued.
